keywords: convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle: Tender strips of chicken are stir-fried in an oriental style sauce cooked with a variety of mushrooms, salad onions and ginger.

method.text: Heat oil in wok and stir-fry garlic for 30 sec. Add chicken and stir-fry for 5 min.
Add pepper, onions, ginger and sliced mushrooms and stir-fry for 8 min.
Stir in whole mushrooms, soy sauce, honey and tomato sauce and stir-fry for 2 min.

title: Chicken and mushroom stir-fry
